about_me.title: About the Author
about_me.bio: Hello and welcome to my travel page! I'm Vasil Andreev, a 25-year-old travel enthusiast with a passion for exploring the world on a budget. Over the past few years, I've honed my skills in SEO, but my true love lies in immersing myself in new cultures and landscapes. Inspired by the nomadic lifestyle, I founded Travel eSIM to share my expertise on saving money from roaming charges. With solo adventures across Europe and Asia under my belt, I'm excited to share my experiences and tips with fellow travelers. Join me as I navigate the globe, one affordable journey at a time.
